pinyin: xu1 ni3 xian4 shi2 zhi4 biao1 yu3 yan2

sentences.english: In Love + Sex With Robots, Levy explains how human-robot love can become a reality.
sentences.chinese: Levy在书中说人与机器间的爱情可以成为现实。

sentences.english: Where all is obscure and unrealized the best similitude is a dream.
sentences.chinese: 一切都是模糊而非现实的，酷似一场梦。

sentences.english: So saying sodium bicarbonate julep is in fact not true.
sentences.chinese: 所以说小苏打去黑头的说法其实不现实。

sentences.english: He says the new facility may make future tests more realistic.
sentences.chinese: 他说，新的设施可能使未来的测试变得更现实。

sentences.english: And what other ways can we make our real world more like these fantasy worlds?
sentences.chinese: 我们又能怎样把现实世界变得像那梦中的国度呢？

sentences.english: People will pay for access to those in a way they won't for the latest episode of House or a reality show.
sentences.chinese: 人们付费来阅览的并非是一段议会的插曲或现实秀。

sentences.english: Unique combination of real time strategy with turn-based strategy, wonderful graphic, exciting gameplay allow you to feel yourself a real world ruler.
sentences.chinese: 令人激动的游戏让你认为自己是一个现实世界统治者。

sentences.english: But we need to make them realistic.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我们需要让她们变得现实起来。

sentences.english: S. officials have dismissed the Chinese proposal as 'untethered from reality.
sentences.chinese: 美国官员曾批评中国的建议太不现实。

sentences.english: The effect of real-time water surface can consumedly enhance the immersion characteristic of virtual reality system.
sentences.chinese: 实时水面效果可以大大增强虚拟现实系统的沉浸感。

sentences.english: Online photo sharing website but based on your real-life social network.
sentences.chinese: 根据你的现实社会关系来在线分享照片网站。

sentences.english: What role does it play within our perception of reality?
sentences.chinese: 在我们的现实视角中它又扮演了什么角色？

sentences.english: Then reality becomes a perfect model that the order of all the forms entangles in integration.
sentences.chinese: 现实也变成了所有纠缠于一体的形式秩序的完美模型。

sentences.english: However, theory and reality don't always match up, especially in the world of software.
sentences.chinese: 然而，理论和现实不总是一致的，尤其在软件世界里。

sentences.english: The tale wittily explores the interaction and tension between reality and imagination.
sentences.chinese: 这篇故事机智地探讨了现实和想象之间的联系和对立。

definition: unattainable/far-fetched/out of reach/exceedingly remote or distant
human nature/humanity/human/the totality of human attributes
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
